byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Veteran indie film executive Bingham Ray is named executive director of the San Francisco Film Society.
snippet: Bingham Ray has been named executive director of the San Francisco Film Society.
lead_paragraph: Bingham Ray has been named executive director of the San Francisco Film Society.

headline.main: Film Executive to Head San Francisco Society
